About This Content
March 2010 End User License Agreement
TopQuadrant makes available all content in this plug-in (“Content”). Unless otherwise indicated below, the Content is provided to you under the terms and conditions of the End User License Agreement (“EULA”). This EULA sets forth the terms applicable to use and licensing by the customer (“Customer”) of software provided by TopQuadrant, Inc. (“TopQuadrant”). It is important that you read this document before installing or using the software provided by TopQuadrant (the “Software”) and any associated documentation or materials provided by TopQuadrant (“Documentation”). A copy of the EULA is available at http://www.topquadrant.com/docs/legal/EULA.pdf. If you do not “accept” this EULA on behalf of Customer, then Customer is not licensed to use the Software, and you must destroy any downloaded copies of the Software in your or Customer‘s possession or control. Please go to the TopQuadrant website at http://www.topquadrant.com/docs/legal/EULA.pdf to download and print a copy of this EULA for your records. Third Party Content Saxon-PE - XPath 2.0, XSLT 2.0, and XQuery 1.0 implementation library
The plug-in is accompanied by software developed by the Saxonica. The binary code of Saxon-PE v9.2 (“Saxon”) is included without modification in the following file:
* lib/saxon9pe.jar
Saxon uses a number of third-party components that are published under licenses as listed below. Your use of Saxon is subject to the terms and conditions of these licenses.
Base64 Encoder/Decoder Netscape Communications Corp Netscape 1.1(online) - Generic Sorter CERN CERN License - Unicode Normalization Unicode Consortium Unicode Terms of Use COPYRIGHT AND PERMISSION NOTICE XPath Parser James Clark - Copyright Notice Regex Translator Thai Open Source Center Ltd. - Copyright Notice Ant Saxon Task Apache Foundation Apache License, Version 2.0(online) Notice
